ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] RE: Question
ygData.msgSnippet: I was told they did away with this feature but I found a workaround myself. If you load the luclin images BUT use the old UI, you can hit inventory and then
ygData.messageBody:
I was told they did away with this feature but I found
a workaround myself.

If you load the luclin images BUT use the old UI, you
can hit inventory and then hit the face button.

Then you can change the face , save it, and when you
use the new ui it will have the new face..


but if /face works even better

Rob

--- Kuervodr@... wrote:
> First off, are you using the newer Luclin graphics?
> I'm assuming you are. It only happens to your
> character or to everyone else you see as well? If
> it's only happening to you try this:
>
> Remove head gear/masks. Pick your desired features
> using the /face command. Force a character save.
> Zone into another area, still without head gear.
> Check yourself, you should be "yourself". If
> not...start over and try again. If you are okay,
> then you should be okay and can put back on head
> gear/masks. Remember, this is if it's happening to
> you only.
>
> Let us know if this works.
>
> If I'm totally misunderstanding what you meant,
> smack me upside the head and speak slowly. :p
>
>
> Also a Rob :)
>
> >> > > Hey Everybody,
> >> > > I'm new to the list! I have a general
> question
> >> that
> >> > > hasen't been
> >> > > answered for a few months now. I'm hoping one
> of
> >> you
> >> > > might know what
> >> > > the heck is going on! Ok, so this is what's
> >> > > happening;
> >> > > Whenever I zone my characters face will
> >> change!?!?!
> >> > > I'm thinking it
> >> > > has something to do with low memory but I
> have
> >> about
> >> > > 500mb of ram.
> >> > > And I'm not too keen on computers so if there
> is
> >> > > another form of
> >> > > memory that could be lacking please enlighten
> >> me!
> >> > > This stupid problem
> >> > > has coused me to quit playing for awhile. It
> >> makes
> >> > > me sooo mad!!!!
> >> > > Sincerely,
> >> > > Deidre
> >> > >
>
>
>
>
